basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli L361 (MIC=50 µM), Pseudomonas fluorescens (MIC>100 µM), Salmonella Salford (MIC>100 µM), Escherichia coli O:9 (MIC=60 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC>100 µM), Listeria monocytogenes (MIC=40 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC>100 µM).
